attributes.action: ensure all social networking sites are blocked on NHS servers throughout the country in an effort to improve patient care.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: After seeing first hand a nurse on Facebook while she was on duty while patients were kept waiting for care, I am asking that all social networking sites be blocked on all the NHS servers in the UK so the staff can concentrate on caring for their patients which is what they are there to do.
